Hi,

I found a possible issue when Target Framework is 4.5 or 4.5.1. The ControlBox - Minimize/Maximize/Close buttons are very difficult, almost impossible, to be clicked. Tooltip text, for these buttons, is not showed. It's like the buttons are continuously refreshed.

When the Target Framework is changed to 4.0 the issue disappear.

The OS is Windows 8.1 Pro.

Has anyone noticed this problem?

Thanks
